instruction: As a Nasdaq-listed company, please prepare to comply with the new board diversity disclosure requirements by utilizing the Nasdaq Board Matrix starting August 8, 2022, and consider adding at least one director who self-identifies as female, an underrepresented minority, or as LGBTQ+.
output: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will ensure that our board complies with the new diversity disclosure requirements using the Nasdaq Board Matrix. We will also actively seek out qualified candidates who self-identify as female, underrepresented minorities, or as LGBTQ+ to join our board and further promote diversity and inclusion, in line with our company values.
